scripts.generate-demo: php demo/generators/index.demo.php > index.html && php demo/generators/layouts_board_one_column.demo.php > demo/layouts/board/one_column.html && php demo/generators/layouts_board_two_columns.demo.php > demo/layouts/board/two_columns.html && php demo/generators/layouts_board_three_columns.demo.php > demo/layouts/board/three_columns.html
